Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This item is not just a product; it's an experience that promises to elevate your daily life. Given its quality and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than $150 to you. For a limited time, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at the special price of $180. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your lifestyle with something truly exceptional. Let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
